resources.string: THE BOOK THAT INSPIRED THE AWARD-WINNING MOVIE Nominated for 12 OSCARS including BEST PICTURE, BEST DIRECTOR and BEST ACTOR Winner of 5 BAFTAS including Best Actor, Best Director and Best Film Winner of the 2016 Golden Globes for Best Motion Picture\n - Drama, Best Actor - Drama, and Best Director The novel that inspired the epic new movie starring Leonardo DiCaprio and Tom Hardy.
